solution_line_template: Becky is four times younger than Eddie, which means she is {eddie_age} / {younger_factor} = <<{eddie_age}/{younger_factor}={becky_age}>>{becky_age} years old.
Her mother is two times older than she, so it means Irene is {becky_age} * {older_factor} = <<{becky_age}*{older_factor}={irene_age}>>{irene_age} years old.
